_header: Walking alone of wit full desolate
Subjects: complaints, lovers’; love, constancy in; fortune, complaint against; Cupid

BodFair16.First Lines:
Walkyng allone of wyt full desolatIn my sprytes turmentyd to and
                    fro…
BodFair16.Last Lines:
…And syth I ment but treuth os in this casehaue routh on me
                    and take me to thy grace
